ComicInfo.Summary:
Part of a range of one off one-shots where Chaos! Comics characters faced off where the last 2 pages consist of an ending where one is defeated and one wins, and the opposite result appears in the companion comic.
Heresy uses Bedlam's hand to travel back in time to ensure her own creation. She manufactures the situation leading to Purgatori and Chastity fighting one another. But her plan doesn't quiet work as she intended and she is defeated, Badlam's hand is ripped from her grasp by Purgatori.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-12 13:11:08. [Issue ID 124778]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/purgatori-vs-chastity-1-ending-alpha/4000-124778/
ComicInfo.Title: Ending Alpha
